replies.body: lower elo's dont know what true hell is.
Sir when i play relly and go 9/0 top lane and i lose cause my adc is 1/15/0 thats elo hell

Now imagine going 9/0 every game and getting verbally abused the rest of the game by 1/15 adc blaming you for them losing which brings down the moral of them team. Silver-- people consider hell being stuck with bad players, Plat-d5 is filled with players that are mechanically good so they think they are never wrong and are just toxic. People afk over one bad gank/cs/picks/etc..

So elo hell doesnt exist at any rank, it really doesn't,  but the toxicity in plat is astonishing compared to other elos.

Not to mention that in silver, someone has to be *astonishingly* heavy to make the game unwinnable. I'm talking just charging down mid dying to the turret. In plat if someone is even somewhat incompetent they're probably going to get milked by their opponent, because the skill difference between the random idiot and the enemy team is 10x what it is in lower eo
Then again this applies for the enemy team players.

No,  you don't understand.  Everyone in plat, _everyone_ thinks they deserve diamond and that's all they try to do.

In Bronze, getting dragged down by someone who doesn't care is bad.  But getting insulted _and_ dragged down by someone who _does_ care is a lot worse.

In Bronze, there are a lot of flamers and ragers, but most people would say Plat is the worst division because everyone wants to advance and take it seriously.
